name: Outro
_source: speak;;You completed the map in 15 or less turns! You got the full reward!;;;hint
speak;Reimu;Alright, it looks like the entrance to the Netherworld is up ahead.
speak;Kasen;You know, I don't think we ever sent an advance notice to them, did we?
speak;Marisa;It's fine. We're all friends anyway!
speak;Alice;Friends is an interesting word, but I suppose we are all acquainted.
speak;Kasen;I suppose that's true...hopefully it all works out fine.
speak;Marisa;We could even stop by and have some tea after!
speak;Marisa;Hey now. When was the last time I made those ghosts mad?
speak;Marisa;See? We even have someone who can speak their language, too!
speak;Reimu;Last time I checked, we all speak the same language.
speak;Mima; Maybe I'd have better luck than you~.|You don't seem exactly compatible.
speak;Marisa;Why don't we just figure this out on the way?|We could get some fresh air too.
speak;Kasen;If we could get much air up here in the first place.
